headline: 3 Russians Are Accused In Poisoning Of Bulgarians
abstract: The trio, members of a secretive group within Russiaâ€™s military intelligence agency, are accused of trying to kill an arms dealer, his son and one of his top executives in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Bulgaria announced criminal charges on Thursday against three Russian spies from a secretive assassination unit for the 2015 poisoning of a prominent Bulgarian arms manufacturer.
